text: Christopher Neal Jackson (born September 30, 1975) is an American actor, singer, musician, and composer. He is known for starring in many of Lin-Manuel Miranda musicals such as Benny in In the Heights and George Washington in the smash hit Hamilton. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American composers Category:Actors from Illinois Category:Singers from Illinois Category:Musicians from Illinois Category:Writers from Illinois Category:People from Metropolis, Illinois
title: Christopher Jackson (actor)
